25652B514CD1440D83C4688003ED8B76: A device that allows players to purchase and apply or remove mods on moddable weapons.
EE4D7BEA46F5E3BC560EE7A7138D068B: A device that allows players to purchase and apply or remove mods on moddable weapons.
C71343894A060847493A649689759A65: A set of cases that can be interacted with to spawn modded weapons.
FA5DCADC4A0C014F7FE7758F6E556F79: Disables the device, preventing mods from being purchased or removed.
02A78E05452B145AB3B0AE95F9C2E8E0: Enables the device and allows players to start grinding.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_WeaponModBench_C.bEnabledOnMiniga: Determines if this device should be enabled when the minigame starts.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WeaponModBench_C.ModCost.Descript: Determines the cost to equip a mod to a moddable weapon. This value applies to all selectable mods. Do Not Override uses the costs that Battle Royale uses and is subject to change.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WeaponModBench_C.Allowed Class.De: Determines which class is able to use this Weapon Mod Bench.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WeaponModBench_C.Allowed Team.Des: Determines which team is able to use this Weapon Mod Bench.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WeaponModBench_C.Disable.Descript: Disables the device, preventing mods from being purchased or removed.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WeaponModBench_C.Enable.Descripti: Enables the device and allows for mods to be purchased and removed.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WeaponModBench_C.Invert Class Sel: If set, the device will allow all but the Allowed Class.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WeaponModBench_C.Invert Team Sele: If set, the device will allow all but the Allowed Team.
